text.help:
§a{prefix} help §f- §bDisplay help message
§a{prefix} run <command name> §f- §bExecute command
§a{prefix} reload §f- §bReload plugin
§a{prefix} list §f- §bList all commands
§a{prefix} skull <player name> §f- §bGet player's skull
text.welcome: Welcome to use ConvinceTool plugin, type §a{prefix} help§f to display help message
text.MCDR_help: A command plugin designed for this server

message.command_no_permission: You don't have permission to use this command
message.not_console: You can't use this command in console
